perturbation.original_text: Sponsor shall pay the Playoff Payments in accordance with Section 2(d) of the Terms and Conditions not later than 30 days following Sponsor’s receipt of an invoice requesting payment for such Playoff Games
perturbation.changed_text: Sponsor shall pay the Playoff Payments in accordance with Section 2(d) of the Terms and Conditions not later than 60 days following Sponsor’s receipt of an invoice requesting payment for such Playoff Games
perturbation.explanation: This change extends the payment deadline for Playoff Payments to 60 days after the invoice date. While seemingly innocuous, extending payment terms without proper justification could be construed as an unfair trade practice or a violation of prompt payment laws in some jurisdictions, if the standard or legally acceptable timeframe is significantly shorter (e.g., 30 days).
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of state-specific prompt payment laws or unfair trade practice laws depending on the jurisdiction and industry standards.
